name: ParentingInformer
tag_list: education-apps-for-kids, parenting-tips, parenting-advice, parenting-books, parenting-classes, parenting-styles, parenting-quotes
overview:
ParentingInformer would like to make a commitment for making the world a better place and developing value and significance with people’s lives in terms of “Parenting”.

Featured on killerstartups.com & Feedmyapp.com http://feedmyapp.com/search/parentinginformer/ http://www.killerstartups.com/web-app-tools/parentinginformer-com-become-a-better-parent/

ParentingInformer.com is a kids entertainment and parental education application that is almost a one stop app for all things kids related. It provides a wealth of information about kids whether they be toddlers or teenagers and features a virtual plethora of advice, tips, styles and stories from real parents around the world. It’s aim is to create a comprehensive place where parents can go to get information on pretty well everything to do with their children.

ParentingInformer is a multi-author website providing parenting advice, tips, styles and stories from real parents like you. By sharing information from other parents around the world they aim to create a community that fosters better and more positive parenting. They also make a commitment to make the world a better place and develop value and significance with people’s lives in terms of “Parenting“.

A wide range of topics are covered including parenting infants, toddlers and teenagers, single parenting, fun activities for families, best educational apps for parents and kids, educational books and classes and quotes for kids and parents. If you have an article that you would like to have published on ParentingInformer or an idea we should write about, you can become an author giving you exposure to the loyal audience of readers and a link back to your website accompanying your article not to mention the satisfaction of knowing you are helping other parents and children. They will even give you a badge of appreciation as a contributing author.

ParentingInformer.com is a website that was built so that experienced parents could share their knowledge about how to take care and educate children with those who have recently become parents for the first time.

If you never had a baby before, you will have a hard time trying to understand the meaning of his crying and other signs he’ll send out all the time. So, the advice available at ParentingInformer.com will be really helpful.

And there’s more to Parenting Informer than how to deal with such domestic issues. There are lots and lots of resources for helping your kids hone their reading and writing skills, for example. And there’s a “Classes” section on the main menu that links to sites which provide exercises in areas such as maths and science. You will also find lessons specially designed for children who have disabilities.

The site also includes free and paid apps, and videos for making education that little more enjoyable for your kids. And there’s a collection of articles dealing with everything a parent should know, such as how to deal with bullying at school.

This is the real deal when it comes to providing advice for parents. ParentingInformer is an excellent and informative education app that delivers all manner of kid related with heaps of articles and tips on parenting toddlers to teenagers. It’s an incredibly simple app to use with everything clearly labeled but you’ll be amazed at the amount of information to be found inside. It’s like having a really good parenting magazine that’s free and available 24/7.

external_links.title: ParentingInformer: Everything you wanted to know about kids
